ARABIC: قَالَ وَمَن يَقْنَطُ مِن رَّحْمَةِ رَبِّهِۦٓ إِلَّا ٱلضَّآلُّونَ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: He said, 'Who despairs of the mercy of his Lord except for misguided people?'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Who would despair of the mercy of his Lord," he answered, "but those who go astray."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Abraham said: "Who despairs of the Mercy of his Lord except the misguided?"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: He said, "No one despairs of the mercy of his Lord except those who are in error.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: He said, “Who is it that despairs from the mercy of his Lord, except those who are astray?”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: He said: "And who despairs of the mercy of his Lord except those who are astray"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: He said: And who despairs of the mercy of his Lord but the erring ones?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: He said, 'And who despairs of the mercy of his Lord, excepting those that are astray?'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: He said: And who despaireth of the mercy of his Lord save those who are astray?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: He said, "Who but the misguided despair of the mercy of their Lord?"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: He said: and who despondeth of the mercy of his Lord except the astray
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: He said, ‘Who despairs of his Lord’s mercy except the astray?!’
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: He said: "And who despairs of the mercy of his Lord, but such as go astray?"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: [Ibrahim (Abraham)] said: "And who despairs of the Mercy of his Lord except those who are astray?"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: He replied: 'And who despairs of the mercy of his Lord, except those that are astray?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: He said, “And who despairs of his Lord’s mercy but the lost?”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: He said, "And who despairs of the mercy of his Lord except for those astray?"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [15:56] He said, ‘And who — in other words, no one — despairs (read yaqnitu or yaqnatu) of the mercy of his Lord, save those who are astray?’, [save] disbelievers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (He said) Abraham said: (And who despaireth not the mercy of his Lord save those who are astray) those who disbelieve in Allah or are ungrateful for His blessings?
